roleset.name: assign a label or attribute
roleset.note: DESCRIBE-V NOTES: Comparison to 'call' attributive sense. Member of VNcls characterize-29.2-1-1. (from describe.01-v)
DESCRIPTION-N NOTES: Based on nouns00080. Vn class characterize-29.2-1-1. Fn class communicate_categorization. Framed by Katie. (from description.01-n)

example.name: all args
example.text: The SEC documents describe those chips, which are made of gallium arsenide, as *trace* being so fragile and minute they will require special robotic handling equipment.
example.arg: those chips, which are made of gallium arsenide
as *trace* being so fragile and minute they will require special robotic handling equipment

example.name: inverted attribute
example.text: a ``seething mass,'' as one trader described it.

example.name: no attribute
example.text: It didn't describe the source of funds or the specific terms of StatesWest securities which were part of the offer.
example.arg: the source of funds or the specific terms of StatesWest securities which were part of the offer

example.name: all args
example.text: Mr. Masson 's description of himself as a `` private asset but public liability '' to Anna Freud
example.arg: as a `` private asset but public liability ''

example.name: Another arg 0 and 1
example.text: Mr. Gould 's minute descriptions of these creatures
